mng: to follow, from, it is for...to, reason, cause, because of, due to, to, to leave it (to sb), by (introduces passive verb)

exm.mng: due to, as a result of, thanks to, owing to, since, because
main content, matter, work, origin of an incident, cause, purpose, subject (of business letter)
the road one must follow or take, the only way
